title: Build Real Robots from Scratch
subtitle: ROBOTICS ENGINEERING BOOTCAMP
details: Design and build complete robots from mechanical body to control panel
Implement PLC logic, kinematics, control theory, and GUIs
Program microcontrollers and simulate full robotic systems
Understand how to build industrial-grade robotics systems from scratch

overview.title: Electrical Panels & PLC Fundamentals
points: Relay-based logic machines and control circuits

overview.title: Advanced Robotics & Integration
points: Qt GUI development for robot control
Full robot panel integration and deployment

about: This is a complete, project-first bootcamp where you'll build real robotic systems from the ground up. By the end, you'll know how to go from CAD design to embedded firmware to real-world robot motion.
projects: Full Robot Panel with Microcontroller + Drivers (Level 7)
Qt GUI-Controlled Robotic Arm with Inverse Kinematics (Level 8)

whoIsThisFor.title: Students & Engineers
whoIsThisFor.description: Learn robotics from real-world problems and get ahead in the automation revolution.

whoIsThisFor.title: Working Professionals
whoIsThisFor.description: Get industry-grade practical knowledge in robotics and automation systems.

whoIsThisFor.title: Makers & Hackers
whoIsThisFor.description: Build and deploy working robots from scratch with cutting-edge robotics technology.

instructor.name: Harpreet Singh
instructor.bio: Harpreet Singh is a Full Self-Driving (FSD) & Robotics Engineer with 5+ years of expertise in AI-driven autonomy, specializing in motion planning, computer vision, and simulation, who has mentored 10,000+ students globally while founding two award-winning Robotics/AI startups recognized by Startup India and Punjab Government, combining deep technical knowledge in AI decision-making and sensor fusion with a passion for advancing intelligent systems through engineering, education and entrepreneurship.
